headline: PNC Receives Regulatory Approvals for Acquisition of FirstBank
summary: The PNC Financial Services Group, Inc. (NYSE: PNC) today announced that it has received the regulatory approvals required to complete its previously announced acquisition of FirstBank Holding Company, including its banking subsidiary, FirstBank. Regulatory approvals have been received from the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System, the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency and the Colorado Division of Banking.
